Name: CH4_VMR_D_ct
LongName: 16-bit count of the number of observations of volume mixing ratio of methane in air
Definition: 16-bit count of the number of observations used in the calculation of volume mixing ratio of methane in air.

Characteristics.Coordinates: Alt: 705 kilometers; Period: 98.8 min; orbits per day: 14.5 (AIRS+AMSU)
Characteristics.Structure: int32: StdPressureLev, CH4_VMR_A, CH4_VMR_A_ct, CH4_VMR_A_err, CH4_VMR_A_max, CH4_VMR_A_min, CH4_VMR_A_sdev, CH4_VMR_D, CH4_VMR_D_ct, CH4_VMR_D_err, CH4_VMR_D_max, CH4_VMR_D_min, CH4_VMR_D_sdev, CH4_VMR_TqJ_A, CH4_VMR_TqJ_A_ct, CH4_VMR_TqJ_A_err, CH4_VMR_TqJ_A_max, CH4_VMR_TqJ_A_min, CH4_VMR_TqJ_A_sdev, CH4_VMR_TqJ_D, CH4_VMR_TqJ_D_ct, CH4_VMR_TqJ_D_err, CH4_VMR_TqJ_D_max, CH4_VMR_TqJ_D_min, CH4_VMR_TqJ_D_sdev: 24 variables: different number of pressure levels for each variable
